sn4.4:4.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Benares, in the deer park at Isipatana.
sn4.4:4.3: There the Buddha addressed the mendicants:
sn4.4:5.1: “Mendicants, I have attained and realized supreme freedom through rational attention and rational endeavor.
sn4.4:5.2: You too should attain and realize supreme freedom through rational attention and rational endeavor.”
sn4.4:5.3: The Māra the Wicked went up to the Buddha
